data.name: Jumpy Hunt
data.detailed_description:
Colourful and innocent looking but extremly HARD...


Jumpy Hunt is a fast pace game where your skills are put to the test.
There is one simple objective: make it to the finish as fast as you can.

BASED ON GRID MOVEMENT
  • The mechanics are very simple. Control your animal with "WASD" or the "ARROW KEYS".
  • Your movement speed depends on how fast you press the keys.

IMPROVE YOUR MOVEMENT TO PERFECTION
  • Perfect timing is everything. Wait for the right moment to jump in.
  • Rush as fast as you can to the finish or fight enemies by bumping them into their weakpoints.

UNFORGIVABLE
  • This game is designed for speedrunners and for those, who want to put their skills to the test.
  • One single mistake and you have to start over.
---------------
  • Over 75 Levels
  • Intuitive and very responsive controls based on grid movement
  • Very high difficulty! Every single move is essential, just one little mistake can keep you away from success.
  • Beat different types of enemies by only using your movement
  • Perfect for speedrunners
  • Not a good choice if you rage quit quickly :)

data.short_description: Colourful and innocent looking but extremly HARD. Jumpy Hunt is a fast pace skill game based on grid movement. You have one simple goal: make it to the finish as fast as you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 or later
  • İşlemci: Intel Core 2 Duo E8500 or AMD Phenom II X3 720.
  • Bellek: 2 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or higher
